text: Tāmen de xiānzhī [shě mǔ wēi luò] duì tāmen shuō:“Tā [ān lā] de wángquán de jīxiàng shì yuē guì jiāng jiànglín nǐmen, lǐmiàn yǒu cóng nǐmen de zhǔ jiàng shì dì níngjìng [zhù 1] hé mù sà [zhù 2] yǔ hā lún [de jiāshǔ] liú xià de yíwù, tiānshǐmen táizhe tā. Cǐ zhōng què yǒu gěi nǐmen de yī zhǒng jīxiàng, jiǎrú nǐmen shì xìnshì.”
